content.rendered:
Press
Praise
Chi & Quốc
Destination Wedding

We are still in awe of the magic you created for us. It’s hard to believe that such a perfect, love-filled day was real – and we owe it all to you. From start to finish, you poured your hearts into every detail, making sure not just the day, but the entire journey, was special and meaningful.

Nguyen (Natalie): You were the heart of it all, the one who held the entire vision together. Your master planning gave us peace of mind and made us feel like we were in the best hands every step of the way. You saw the big picture while also managing the smallest details, ensuring that every piece of our wedding came together seamlessly.

Thao Vu: You took our mood boards and Pinterest dreams and turned them into a real-life fairytale. Every corner of the venue, every table setting, every floral arrangement – they felt like they came straight out of a storybook. We still can’t believe how beautifully you captured the essence of who we are as a couple. You didn’t just create décor; you created an atmosphere that felt like pure magic.

Thao Bui: You were our angel. You went above and beyond to make sure we felt loved and supported – not just as the bride and groom, but as two people experiencing such an emotional day. From calming last-minute nerves to making sure we always had what we needed, you made us feel truly cared for.

Thanh Le: Music has always been a big part of our love story, and you turned our playlist into something unforgettable. Every note, every transition fit the mood perfectly and elevated the moments in ways we didn’t think were possible.

Tu Anh: Your dedication to our traditional ceremony was incredible. You understood how deeply important it was to us, and you treated every element with care and respect. From the cultural touches to the meaningful details, you honored our traditions while seamlessly blending them with the rest of the celebration.

Together, you weren’t just a team of professionals – you were our dream team, our partners, and even our friends through this journey. You made sure that everything reflected us, down to the smallest detail, and we can never thank you enough for that. You gave us something so precious: a day where we could be fully present in the moment, surrounded by love, without a single worry. That’s a gift we will treasure for the rest of our lives. Thank you for being there for us, for caring so deeply, and for creating a day that was beyond anything we could have imagined.

VIEW FULL ARTICLE
Eric & Helen
Destination Wedding

We have watched the wedding videos a hundred times! We simply feel so lucky to have you as our wedding planner. Our friends also praised your team a lot. It was incredible to have a wedding theme that fitted InterContinental Danang so well; the costumes, the decoration, everything was matching and astonishing!

Eric said that he was amazed of what we have in Vietnam, everything we ask for is already in Vietnam. We went to a lot of countries in the world and we know they can’t fulfill what you brought to the table for us.

VIEW FULL ARTICLE
Quỳnh Sơn
Ballroom Wedding

We send our biggest thank to The Planners team for yesterday’s wedding. We are extremely happy and proud to have been on this journey with such responsible wedding planners who take care of us every step of the way. We thank you again and will definitely recommend your team to many more of our friends! Yesterday was so much fun and our guests showered us with compliments!

VIEW FULL ARTICLE
Maria & Duy
Ballroom Wedding

We thank The Planners Saigon team so much for having always supported us at everything, even the tiniest stuff. Almost a year of coming up with ideas and creating the concept to deliver a wedding exceeding all of our expectations, we truly and extremely appreciate you. We also thank you for always keeping us stress-free for our big day. Although the wedding is over, we’d love to keep in touch with you guys. Love The Planners!

VIEW FULL ARTICLE
Preparing

for a business event or a cozy party? Or you need expert help with styling and decoration?

LET’S CHAT

serpData.description: The Planners will find out the characteristics of the customer's love story, combining the interests and aspirations to write a wonderful wedding theme and your wedding ceremony will be transformed into a unique party.
